channel.title: Connection Error. Please Help
channel.description: Please help me. I am fairly new at coding. But not with Java or computers. Though coding isnt my problem. Everything in my server is fine except... Connecting... I have to portforward. Which is very impossible. I have went to (192.168.1.1)(my router) and made a port as.[code]RSPS 43594 to 43594 TCP [v] Enabled[/code] But nomatter what. Nobody can connect. i made ports with Both enabled. Just UDC and i even used specific ip's for my friends via firewall ports. But NOTHING will work... Do you think somebody could come help me? Please i am despirate! i am always on the pc. i just need some major help.

item.title: Connection Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Be sure you are forwarding the correct Local IP.

To check go to Command Prompt and type Ipconfig/all

Where it says Ip Address…That’s the ip to forward.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Error. Please Help

Please help me. I am fairly new at coding. But not with Java or computers. Though coding isnt my problem. Everything in my server is fine except… Connecting… I have to portforward.
